name: Mailchimp
natural_language_description: 这是 Mailchimp 节点。主要用于: Consume Mailchimp API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: member | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll | (必填项)
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many campaigns
Resend (值: resend) - Creates a Resend to Non-Openers version of this campaign

list.name: list
list.description: List of lists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
list.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Name or ID | 作用: List of lists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email address of the subscriber | (必填项)

status.name: status
status.natural_language_description: 参数名: Status | 作用: Subscriber's current status | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: beforeCreateTime (值: None) - Restrict the response to campaigns created before the set time
beforeSendTime (值: None) - Restrict the response to campaigns sent before the set time
excludeFields (值: None) - A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
fields (值: None) - A comma-separated list of fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
listId (值: None) - List of lists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
sinceCreateTime (值: None) - Restrict the response to campaigns created after the set time
sinceSendTime (值: None) - Restrict the response to campaigns sent after the set time
sortDirection (值: None) - Determines the order direction for sorted results
sortField (值: None) - Returns files sorted by the specified field
status (值: None) - The status of the campaign

locationFieldsUi.name: locationFieldsUi
locationFieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Location | 作用: Subscriber location information.n | 默认值: {}

mergeFieldsUi.name: mergeFieldsUi
mergeFieldsUi.description: An individual merge var and value for a member
mergeFieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Merge Fields | 作用: An individual merge var and value for a member | 默认值: {}

groupsUi.name: groupsUi
groupsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Interest Groups | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 10

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: emailType (值: None) - Type of email this member asked to get
language (值: None) - If set/detected, the subscriber's language
mergeFieldsUi (值: None) - An individual merge var and value for a member
ipOptIn (值: None) - The IP address the subscriber used to confirm their opt-in status
ipSignup (值: None) - IP address the subscriber signed up from
timestampSignup (值: None) - The date and time the subscriber signed up for the list in ISO 8601 format
skipMergeValidation (值: None) - Whether member data will be accepted without merge field values, even if the merge field is usually required
vip (值: None) - Vip status for subscribers
timestampOpt (值: None) - The date and time the subscribe confirmed their opt-in status in ISO 8601 format

tags.name: tags
tags.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tags | 默认值: []

groupCategory.name: groupCategory
groupCategory.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
groupCategory.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group Category Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Campaign ID | 作用: List of Campaigns | (必填项)
